General.Name: Sichuan Guoguang Agrochemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Guoguang Agrochemical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, marketing, and distribution of agrochemical products and materials in China. The company's products include plant growth regulators, fertilizers, fungicides, insecticides, bio-pesticide, and herbicides. It also exports its product to the United States, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Vietnam, Pakistan, Egypt, and internationally. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Chengdu, China.

4.Name: Mr. Jie  He
4.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang., Sec. of the Board and Director
